description: Advanced text-to-video generation with multiple style options and high-resolution output up to 1080p

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: Epic low-cut camera capture of a girl clad in ultraviolet threads...

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video

resolution.description: The resolution of the generated video

duration.description: The duration of the generated video in seconds. 8s videos cost double. 1080p videos are limited to 5 seconds

style.description: The style of the generated video

negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to specify what should not appear in the video
negative_prompt.placeholder: blurry, low quality, low resolution, pixelated, noisy

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. Same seed with same prompt will produce identical videos

prompt_details.style_guide: Create detailed, artistic descriptions with strong visual elements and creative flair
best_practices: Use vivid, descriptive language with artistic terminology
Include specific visual styles and artistic references
Describe lighting, colors, and atmospheric effects
Mention camera angles and cinematographic elements

example_prompts.title: Artistic Fantasy
example_prompts.prompt: Epic low-cut camera capture of a girl clad in ultraviolet threads, Peter Max art style depiction, luminous diamond skin glistening under a vast moon's radiance, embodied in a superhuman flight among mystical ruins, symbolizing a deity's ritual ascent, hyper-detailed

example_prompts.title: Cyberpunk Scene
example_prompts.prompt: Neon-lit cyberpunk warrior walking through rain-soaked streets, holographic advertisements flickering in the background, chrome armor reflecting city lights, dramatic low-angle shot

request.prompt: A magical girl transforming in a sparkly environment with floating petals
A futuristic robot walking through a sci-fi laboratory with glowing screens and advanced technology
request.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, low resolution, pixelated

example_requests.title: Vertical Social Media
example_requests.description: Vertical video for social media platforms

request.prompt: A dancer performing contemporary dance in a minimalist studio with dramatic lighting

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Use artistic and creative language for better results
Specify visual styles to get consistent aesthetic
8-second videos cost double but allow more complex scenes
Use negative prompts to avoid unwanted visual artifacts
Experiment with different aspect ratios for various use cases
limitations: 1080p videos are limited to 5 seconds maximum
8-second videos cost twice as much as 5-second videos
Style parameter affects the overall aesthetic significantly
Complex prompts may require longer processing times
